Title: Bookworm e-book reader
Description:
Bookworm is a WPF front-end for reading and managing e-books.
It also includes re-usable libraries for packaging, opening and indexing e-books.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Bookworm is a WPF front-end for reading and managing e-books.
It also includes re-usable libraries for packaging, opening and indexing e-books.
